pkgmetadata.longdescription: Whitening and High-Dimensional Canonical Correlation Analysis // Implements the whitening methods (ZCA, PCA, Cholesky, ZCA-cor, and PCA-cor) discussed in Kessy, Lewin, and Strimmer (2018) "Optimal whitening and decorrelation", The American Statistician, doi:10.1080/00031305.2016.1277159, as well as the whitening approach to Canonical Correlation Analysis allowing negative canonical correlations described in Jendoubi and Strimmer (2018) "Probabilistic canonical correlation analysis: a whitening approach", arXiv:1802.03490.
